description: CanvasSpace is a space that represents a html canvas. It creates a new canvas or get an existing one in DOM by its id attribute. It also provide methods specific to html canvas, such as tracking resize and mouse position.

funcs.description: Create a CanvasSpace which represents a HTML Canvas Space
funcs.name: CanvasSpace
param: id an optional string which refers to the "id" attribute of either a <div> container in which a <canvas> will be created within, or an existing <canvas> itself. If not defined, a <div id="pt_container"><canvas id="pt" /></div> will be added to DOM.

callback an optional callback function with parameters function (boundingBox, spaceElement) which will get called when canvas is appended and ready. A "ready" event will also be fired from the <canvas> element when it's appended, which you may track with instance.space.addEventListener("ready")

funcs.description: display(...) function is deprecated as of 0.2.0. You can now set the canvas element directly in the constructor, and customize it using setup().
funcs.name: display

funcs.description: Set up various options for CanvasSpace. The opt parameter is an object with the following fields. This is usually used during instantiation, eg new CanvasSpace(...).setup( { opt } )
funcs.name: setup
param: opt.bgcolor a hex or rgba string initial background color of the canvas
opt.resize a boolean to set whether <canvas> size should auto resize to match its container's size
opt.retina a boolean to set if device pixel scaling should be checked. This may make drawings on retina displays look sharper but may reduce performance slightly. Default is true.

funcs.description: Set whether the canvas element should resize when its container is resized. Default will auto size
funcs.name: autoResize
param: auto a boolean value indicating if auto size is set. Default is true.

funcs.description: This overrides Space's resize function. It's a callback function for window's resize event. Keep track of this with onSpaceResize(w,h,evt) callback in your added objects.
funcs.name: resize

funcs.description: Clear the canvas with its background color. Overrides Space's clear function.
funcs.name: clear
param: bg Optionally specify a custom background color. If evaluated to false, it will use its bgcolor property as background color.

props.description: A property to store canvas DOM element
props.name: space
